Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Exception crystal clear sound @ max volume
Cons: Nonportability, Batteries, smug marks, NO INSTRUCTIONS
Bose move over, these are arguably better digital sound with the bonus of color choice. Resounding Bass resonates and is balanced well. Audible unmuffeled without being overwhelming drowning out subtleties. The highs are remarkably crisp, so responsive you almost hear the drum stick hit the high-hat. They scream out without being screechy or piercing. The midrange adds full rich sounds without adding noise or garble. This is common in cheep headsets that often electronically lower mid-range giving the tin can sound. I was going to buy floor speakers to add to what I have. However after listening to Dre's Studio set Cha-ching. The science to good sound Is complex ... but the crossover settings and drivers sound like a perfect marriage. Video games sound 3D, I heard an enemy behind me turned around and added points. Lastly I use when mowing the lawn with a battery operated mower it's loud until I place the headset on. The noise is gone I hear the music without competition from the mower.You can wear them where ever you go but are bulky to store even with the custom case. It sucks the headset uses batteries and shows every touch therefore must be cleaned after use. The price is steep but I have yet to hear a better set. The brand has less expensive models but the sound is less dynamic too. Unbelievable. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: sound durability comfort
Cons: price maybe
I bought these headphones and I love them. By far the best headphones I have ever owned. The bass is so crisp. I used them while traveling and wore them for long periods of time. Overall very comfortable. The only bad thing is that they run on batteries, However the batteries will give you about 40 hours of great sound quality.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Powerfully bass, great fit, very comfortable.
Cons: Price, no volume cable.
I really liked this headphones but my only complaint was that the cable doesn't have skip, forward or volume up or down. Other than that, this are great. Beautiful sound and no distortion.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice sound, but Monster Customer Service is AWFUL
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound
Cons: No quality control or customer service at Monster/Beats!
Let me start off by saying that these are some of the best sounding headphones on the market. Richer sound than my Bose QC15's. But this is my second set of these headphones. First one had a defective battery compartment. Best Buy swapped them out for me in an instant. Second set had a broken Travel Case. First call to Monster Customer Support ended up with "customer service" first suggesting I order a new case from their website, AT MY EXPENSE. Then, he cut off my call when I asked to speak to a supervisor. Second call to Monster Customer Support went better, and I was given a return authorization and a promise that they'd send a replacement case as soon as they received my defective one. Over one mon ... th ago, I received an e-mail acknowledgement that they had my case, but I still haven't received my replacement case or response to my e-mail asking for my delivery date! If you think you'll never need customer support, then maybe these are for you. If not, and you value being treated with respect, go with BOSE! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality and they look cool
Cons: Right ear cup came not as sturdy and firm compared to left side.
There's an article online where they compare and list the best noise canceling headphones. They are very clear and right about the fact that this cans weren't created for noise canceling purposes, these headphones are for a high quality-vivid music experience. In fact the experts say it would be unfair to rate and compare them in the noise canceling category but set them in their own and unique category where no other headphones are.
I own the Bose QC15 and now the Dr Dre Studio in red (coolest color by the way). Both are totally different cans and can't be compared. It would be like comparing apples with bananas. Bose are for travelers who need an excellent no ... ise canceling system and great sound. Beats by Dr Dre Studio might not have the same noise isolation for sure as the Bose but sound, bass, highs and lows are AMAZING. Look wise are the best designed and coolest ones. Sound quality, you can't compare them with anything else. Beats are waaaaaay better and sound vivid. It's like being in a concert. I played the same music in both cans, Bose and Beats. Beats has simply the best sound quality. I would only use (maybe) my Bose for traveling. For music and movies I am super happy with my Dr Dre Studios.
If you are an avid listener and want a whole new listening experience get them. Plus the looks are great. If you want the best noise canceling headphones get the BoseQC 15
Sound does leak some in Dr Dre but who cares? When you wear them and start the music you get to another world. Get them. You won't be disappointed. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: good looking; very good sound and bass
Cons: too expensive
I bought this product for new years and I still use them on a regular basies. They look sleek and cool and I love Dre products anyways so I fell in love with them automaticly when I saw the picture online. Then on the association: Boston Celtics you even notice Nate Robbison wearing them. I bought them and they have expectional sound, maybe not as well as I predicted. I wouldn't pay two hundred dollars for them again, but they are better then skull in my opinion. Overall I take care and treat these headphones they they are my baby, so unless you don't want to pay for looks, ok sound and can take the worry of losing they's for a couple minutes, I recommend this product. These headphones take dedication for their ... price. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: good looking; very good sound and bass; good box and carrying case; mute button; control talk awesome!
Ok, let's start with the good. They look great, and they feel great. I can wear them for extended periods of time with no discomfort. The carrying case is huge so I never use it, but it's very sturdy and if you needed to use it, the one it comes with is great. Control talk works very well and have had no problem with sound quality. Everything sounds great on them. Now for the not so good. These things are super expensive. I definately wouldn't pay over 200$ for them, and definately not the 350 that monster asks for them. They also require batteries in them just to play (so if they die while you're on the road, you may be out of luck). I would expect just the noise-cancelling ... function to stop, but no the whole thing won't work without your batterires. They also leak noise like crazy. Don't plan for your music listening to be private unless you listen to music very quietly. But then who buys these to listen to soft quiet classical music? Joking aside, these probably won't work for using in the library while you're studying.
Lastly, I've personally had problems with the cords. The cord from the headput going to your music device is super long. And i've had a problem with it catching on objects such as in class on desks or when i bend down to pick something up it'll catch on my knee. This had let to them fraying at the top where it connects to the headphones. It happened in just a couple weeks the first time. I sent both back to monster and unfortunately they only sent one cord back (i'll have to work with them to find out where my cord went but my emails have gone unreplied so far). But they did replace one of the cords, and it was fairly simple process, just had to pay shipping there. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: The beats br dr. dre are great!
Item.Review:
Pros: good looking; very good sound and bass
Cons: too expensive; batteries required
I belive the the beats by dr . dre are amazingg!!!! when you waer them they are the most comfortable thuing that i have ever worn in my entire life!! They are lightweight and the sound quality is just oustanding! They are easy to carry around every where you go due to the fact that they are light and easy to store in a bag. I do have a few cons to this product. It is VERY expensive! I know they are a very great quality item but it is not easy to keep in your budget. I think they are wonderful but they can break very easy.... you have to be extrmely careful not to drop them because they are made of plastic.... i mean you have to drop them really hard for them to break but what i am paying for ... it i think it should take a long time for something to break. Another con is the amount of battery it takes to operate the headphone... i think for what i am paying the headphomnes should be rechargeable and not run off of batteries. I thin the product is great and i hope it works for you like it works for me! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review: These head phones are perfect for just listening to music around the house. They are easy to take anywhere, and great size. I think that all headphones should be just like these. They have a perfect sound quality and amazing bass! I would mainly recommend who listen to rap/hiphop music the most to buy these headphones. The reason being is because they were actually meant for that kind of music. haha I went down to the Apple store and tried these headphones with many kinds of different genres of music and for sure rap/hiphop sounded the best on them. I don't know if it was because of the bass that that kind of music usually has or the treble but it sounded tons better than rock. When you buy these headphones you also get a carrying case with it. All you have to do is fold it up and then pla ... ce it in the case so that it fits well and then just zip it up and that's all you have to do. Overall great headphones for all ages to use. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: good box and carrying case; good looking; very good sound and bass; mute button
These headphones have great sound quality and bass. I'm in love with them, it's better than seeing the music live in concert. They're very stylish too, and because of the price, i'm glad that it comes witha durable carrying case to keep the headphones in so they don't get ruined. I love these headphones!

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: good box and carrying case; good looking; mute button; very good sound and bass
Cons: batteries required
I anticipated alot from this product. Beyond alot. Words could not describe how excited i was for this product to arrive in front of my door. However owning this product for over an year i;d say there decent. Not only are they good headphones they look awesome. I think you pay for 25% of the looks and 75% of the quality it gives you. It is extremely portable because it folds up. The downside is it need batterys. Yes these headphones need batteries. It comes with a mute button on the ear side to mute the music thats currently playing not pause it, just mute it. It also comes with a black wire. The blackwire can be attatched to a phone because it has a microphone on it ... allowing it hands free capabilities. It also has a button on the black wire that can be used on smartphones to change the nrext song or go back a song. Smartphones as is blackberries or iphones etc.. These also come in a very stylish box and design expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: Way over priced for what you get
Item.Review:
Pros: The style
Cons: Poor construction for the price and loud to the people around you
Sound quality is good at best. The biggest problem i had was that everyone in the room can hear your music comming from the headphones!

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Very loud, lots of bass, looks flashy
Cons: takes batteries, expensive
I was planning on getting the Bose headphones until I tried the Beats out at BEst Buy. This headphone is LOUD on my ipod touch. I bought a Sony Studio MDR-V600 premium headphones about 7 years ago. I thought those were king until I realized I was not getting the loudness while listening to my ipod or from my PC. So this year I got a nice income tax refund so I ventured down to BB. I bought the red headphones. While I am not a fan at all of Dr Dre- these headphones rock! I did a comparrison ith my older Sony model and the Beat blew it out of the water! This headphone is so loud that I have to turn the volume down on my ipod touch (something I never did with my other models). The only downside to these ... is that it takes 2 AAA batteries. You have to remember to turn the headphones on and off. You will have to stock up on batteries. It comes with 2 awesome audio cords - a black and a red one. The black one has a microphone where you can use it to take calls on your cell phone hands free. It works very well- no complaints at all about the mic. The packaging is overdone in my opinion. THis unit is packaged very solidly. The plastic shell carry case is a premium case. Also comes with a cleaning cloth which comes in handy as the shiney plastic tends to get fingerprints. If you lose or break an audio cord- they are available online.After using the Beats- I don't think I could ever switch to a lesser brand. The price is aabout $100 too high in my opinion. If you got money to spend on headphones- check out the Monster beats by dr dre.... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: Great sound, but a little expensive.
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound is amazing other than the occasional interference.
Cons: Price is quite high, and headband feals cheap.
The sound on these is amazing, and the bass is the best for any pair of headphones i've ever had. The price is quite high, but the sound is much better than any headphones at this price level. The amount of extras in the box is kinda cool, but I probably won't ever use some of the things included. I only have two complaints. First of all, the headband feals a little cheap, and I've heard that they break quite easily. Secondly, every once in a while, the left headphone picks up interference. It only bothers me when the music isn't really loud, and it only happens in certain places, but it can be very annoying when it does happen.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound, Style
Cons: Price is kind of high
Got a pair of these a few weeks ago, and I must say I am very impressed with the sound quality. I'll put it out immediately that i'm no audiophile. If you fall into that category these most certainly are not for you.
I read a lot of reviews, some of them really unfavorable, but its very easy to see how they're shadowed by all the good ones. These things just plain rock. As far as music types go I listen to a lot of hip-hop and rap, and a decent amount of rock and alternative. While these obviously shine listening to hip hop and rap, there is a possibility the might not sound as good playing rock or alternative - I noticed this while listening, and changed the EQ on my iPod to Rock, and it made them sound 10 times better. I ... f you're using a device without this feature just know the headphones may not sound as great.
Another note i'll throw in is one of the reasons I bought these is because of their looks. They get a lot of attention, which could be bad, but they're not insanely hideous like the Skull Candy Aviators. Lets be honest, most of the other over the ear headphones make you look like a studio DJ or 50 year old business traveler.
Obviously I haven't had them long enough to report on their build quality but so far so good.
I would buy them again in a heartbeat. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Big and fit around ear comfortably
Cons: They leak to much
I love these headphones i have 1 major flaw and 1 minor flaw. The minor flaw is that it takes batteries but honestly if you don't want to buy these headphones because they take batteries you probably shouldn't even buy headphones. The major reason is the Studio Beats By Dre leak a lot and if your listening to a song the person right next to you can hear what song your listening to perfectly fine. Now not saying that these headphones aren't one of the greatest sounds I have ever heard. These headphones have a huge kick of bass depending on the song you are listening to. Another reason why i love these headphones and even though the bass is huge and kickass on these headphones they do not drown out the other so ... unds such as the highs, mids, lows, and the treble still sound great even with a kick of bass. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality, style, looks, features
Cons: Comfort isn't so great, your ears get itchy and hot after so long, batteries
These are the best pair of headphones I've ever purchased. I would recommend them to anyone. The sound quality is unbeatable, the bass is incredibly deep, to the point that it vibrates your entire body. There are so many great features to come with these, it is definitely worth the $300. Heck, I would pay $300 just because of the way they LOOK! They're gorgeous, stylish, flawless, epic, etc. :D Nothing better than these! Worth every penny. Especially in this color!

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality and design
Cons: Built quality and price
I've been rockin Beats by Dre for a year or so, and I absolutely love them! The built quality is okay and the price is a bit stiff, but the design is just hands down sexy and the sound is awesome.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: Ok, but Not what I was expecting...
Item.Review:
Pros: They were comfy and looked cool.
Cons: The price and wheres the bass??
When I bought these (online) I expected to be blown away. Ive been using a pair of SkullCandy "Skullcrushers" for a couple years now (that cost me like $70) and figured it was time for a upgrade. I couldnt wait to try these out and once I did, it was like "thats it?" I will admit the sound higher tones had great sound quality but I didnt hear anything for lows or bass. I figured since these were made by Dre and Monster, there would be some good bass. Maybe my pair was defective or something, but I was very let down. Returned 2 days after purchase.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: The Bass is awesome
Cons: The price of the headphones.
This is a awesome headphone. The sound is the best. The bass in the headphone makes it what its paid for. i would get two but it's too much money.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: Best headphones I've owned by far
Item.Review:
Pros: good looking; very good sound and bass; good box and carrying case; mute button; light weight
Cons: too expensive; batteries required; Leak noise
I bought these headphones when monster was having the friends and family sale. I missed it when they were selling it for $99 but another deal did come up to buy them for $149, though it was refurbished.
Anyways, I've bought a lot of cheaper headphones such as the Panasonic RP-HTX7, Wesc Bongo, and Sennheiser HD555. And Dr Dre's, are way crisper in sound, and have a definite noticeable 'kick-your-ear' base that I extremely love.
Yes, these are quite expensive for about $300 more or less, but if you can buy them at the price I got them for, it is definitely worth every penny!!
I'm sure there are tons of head ... phones out there that are perhaps better and way cheaper than these, but for the design and the name, I would definitely recommend them to someone else.
Only cons are, that it leaks a some amount of noise and that you need batteries. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: EVERYTHING
These headphones are TOTALLY The Holy Grail of Headphones!!! What a remarkable CREATION!!!! The sound is BANANAS and well worth the price. You definitely get your money's worth and THEN some!!!

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Overall Decent Value For Money, I Would Definitely Recommend These Over The Solo Ones Because Of The Noise Isolation.
Sound Quality : Awesome At High Bit Rates i.e. 256kbps AAC or 320kbps MP3, Acceptable below that. It Does Leak A Bit But I Can Live With That.
Design : Biggest plus point these look fantastic, Monster also provide you with a neat carry case and a cleaning cloth as well as 2 battery's to get you started.
Accessories: It also comes with 2x 3.5MM jack cable connectors, one with control talk so if you have an Iphone/Blackberry you can control the volume etc and receive calls, almost like a headset. It also comes with a thicker connection I think which you can use on airplanes.
All in all a fantastic product, and with the reduction not bad value for m ... oney if you consider the high end bose ones, these also look way cool.
Also Comet say it comes with a one year warranty, on the box and in the manual/handbook it states you get two years so another plus point. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: Great headphones, but beware of smudges!
Item.Review:
Pros: Bass, colour, design/style, sound quality and clarity of music
Cons: Smudges, noise cancellation should be up to par like the Bose QC 15 Acoustic Noise Cancelling Headphones
I have three (soon to be four) pairs of the Beats by Dr. Dre Studio Headphones. I own the Limited Edition Silver, Red, White, and I'm getting the Black coloured ones in the next few days. The Red model has the same sound quality and features as the other Studio colours that I own, except the only difference is the colour. The colour is very slick and stylish, however like every other Studio model apart from the Silver ones these are prone to smudges that even if you clean with the cleaning cloth that comes included in the Studio box, you still cannot get the smudges off.
If you want these Stu ... dio headphones and don't mind the smudges, then go for these or any other colour that I tell you about in this review. However if you're the type of person like me who doesn't like smudges but still likes the Studio headphones then go for the Silver Limited Edition Studio headphones. They are smudge resistant because they're not glossy like the other Studio headphones.
Like the other Studio headphones the bass on these cans is super powerful. Yes, there is sound leakage but I don't mind it. Some owners have complained that their Studios break easily. That has never happened to me. I keep all my headphones in their cases when not in use, and I never bend them at all. If you just do like I do in this case, then you'll keep these headphones for many good years. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfort and Looks
Cons: Small range for HD headphones
I friend of mine picked up a pair of these and I was trying his out. I had always had a good deal of respect for these headphones and still do. They sound good not great but good. However, I found that when I would turn the volume up, for things like a plane ride, the subwoofers in the headphones could not handle it. This came as a great surprise to me because I have a pair of Klipsch Image S4 headphones that I have never topped out. They are good headphones just they are not worth the price my recommendation is to try the Bowers and Wilkins P5 they cost the same and have superb sound quality and range.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: They look cool, and the display had huge bass.
Cons: On an iPod, they dont sound like the display.
If you have already made up your mind on these then dont waste your time reading this. This was my experience and I hope it may help someone else. I wanted to buy a good pair of headphones. Of course the cream of the crop at Best buy yielded 2 pairs. Beats and Bose. I kicked around the Beats by Dre and the Bose QC15's for weeks. Going into the store and listening to both for entire lunch breaks trying to decide which one. At the end of the day The Bose had Incredible noise canceling and crisp sound, great reviews, and the Dre Beats had very cool "hip hop" looks and great bass. and they had that cool look that screamed "300 dollar cans YO!". . My Practical side ... screamed "Get the Bose" but my love for cool looking trendy things and my love for bass won, so I got the Dre Beats.
First off The Bass is not as good as the store display. My guess is that they are pumping more watts through those then an iPod puts out. Because on a regular iPod you dont get that head shaking bass you got on the display at the store that was playing "Boom Boom Pow". This was bad because it was the primary reason I bought them. I know many people have said that there is too much bass in these but that was ok with me. It was the very reason I got them. Those people obviously dont own these. They just saw dre's name and put a lable on these as "for bass heads only" and then cracked out a bad review based on that assumption.. This is not the case as I found them to not have enough bass.
I HATE taking things back to the store. I tried to find every reason to keep these and not go through the pain of returning them.. But at the end of the day they were not even close to being worth 300 bucks and I could not talk my self in to keeping them. After returning them I went over and plugged into the sony XB500's for 79 bucks. These are sonys "extra bass model". They had EVERY bit of the bass the Beats had. They were not as good at noise canceling but the sound and bass was 100% there.
IF you are on the ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Great bass
Cons: Broken after a month.
While the sound of these headphones can't be beat, they don't hold up very long. I bought these as a Christmas present and they have already broken less that a month after Christmas. The person who received the present hasn't tried to return them yet, but I have a feeling it's going to be a hassle since they are still under the factory warranty.. I did buy an extended warranty and it appears that I'm going to need it a lot!

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Great sound, nice case to store them in
Cons: Price
Bought these headphones for my son for Christmas even though I thought they were too expensive. However, after hearing them myself I have never heard such great sound from a set of headphones.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Color, Sound, Comfort
Cons: Leaking Sound, Price
My girlfriend recently got me these for christmas. I'll start off by saying these headphones are really good for pretty much blocking any noise around you. The sound quality is amazing. You can wear these for 3+ hours and it'll still be comfy. The way it folds in half makes it easier to hide in my car and anywhere else. They are very durable. I just wish there was a volume control cord for my phone. I also wish the price wouldn't be so high, but it is most definitely worth every penny. I recommend getting the warranty for them because depending on how high you listen to your music, you can blowout a speaker.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Stylish, Sound, comfort.
Cons: Sound leaks out.
I did some research before I finally went with the studio during the $25 gift card promotion. I use it daily to listen to music, gaming and movie watching. Sound quality is top notch, and comfortable. You can't hear any noises in your surrounding once you put it on but people around you can hear what you are listening to if you crank up the volume. Other than that, I am happy with the product. Hope this review helps.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound Quality
Cons: Comfort
Quality of sound is second to none. I owned a Bose also and this one blows away Bose in terms of sound quality. However, in terms of comfort, I would give the upper hand to Bose. Price is a bit on the expensive side so if you can afford it - go for it.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound, Durable, no scratches (so far)
Cons: price.
I use these headphones at work everyday. Trust me, I work with annoying people. This is probably the best purchase that i've made in a long time. Not only i get to block people out, but I also get to enjoy my music. Win-Win. Comfortableness of these headphones could be a little bit better but that's because i mainly wear a hat so that's probably on my part.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality, appearance!
Headphones are great, I use them when I'm studying, or on a trip & theyve been great. Sound quality is crisp & sounds amazing. If you have somebody near you that you don't wanna hear talk, they're that much better. Great buy

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Absolute quality!
Cons: Durability.
I've tested these headphones a bunch of times and while I was convinced they're good and worth the purchase, I wasn't entirely blown over at first. After I got sick of my $10 Sony earbuds, I decided to splash out and these are my thoughts:
1. I expected something hardy for $300 but my initial impression is that if I drop these on the road (which is a real possibility for me), they're finished. Highly recommend that geek squad thing!
2. Sounds incredible when I get to pick my own music! Guys like Jay-Z or even the Black Eyed Peas sound totally different, it's amazing!
3. Fell asleep wearing them, extremely comfortable and noise cancelling is somewhat true. Don't wear them while crossing the streets, you'd never hea ... r a car honk.
4. For my first pair of headphones, they look incredible! I chose red but I'm sure the white or the Red Sox ones are sweet too.
5. It kinda sucks that batteries are needed.
Hope this helps! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound Quality, Style, Comfort
Cons: Price
I am a musicion. I record on an almost daily basis, mostly just for fun, but also for public uses. These are the best headphones I have ever owned for the recording side. I am also an avid listener to music. I was never a hige fan of over-ear headphones, but these are amazing. I am almost never without these on my head or around my neck. The color is great too.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
I recently purchased a pair of these amazing headphones online saving myself £70+ on RRP. which in itself is a dream.
I'd heard a lot of comments and video's on YouTube etc. I have to say they're top quality in all aspects. The design, build and richness of sound give the Bose equivalent a run for their money.
Beside the Dre headset are a design marvel, easy and comfortable to wear and a massive fashion accessory for all.
Highly recommended of you have the dosh!

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality
Cons: Mute button didn't work on two pair of these... returned both.
I LOVED the sound quality of these headphones, however, I bought them, and the Mute button didn't work. I returned that pair, and the second pair's Mute button didn't work either. I was very disappointed and just returned the second pair and did not bother with getting another. For $300, those should absolutely have no problems.
Thanks!

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Sound Quality
Cons: LEAKS SOUND TERRIBLY
The sounds Leaks right through you can hear every word. You can't listen in public or people will yell at you to turn down. I think they are using cheaper materials to build now that they are catchin on.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: The sound
Cons: The price and leaking of sound
I personally use these headphones every single day and they seem to stay durable and in good conditon and they have an excellent sound. However, there noise cancelling isnt near as good as bose quiet comfort and they are a little overpriced. I also dont enjoy how this headphones leak so much sound. If you want to listen to your music next to somone you can not even turn it up even over half way because the person next to you would be able to hear every single word crisp and clear.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sounds great !
Cons: Too expensive !
i bought this for my daugther it was great, sounds different than those regular headphones, its loud. if you just putting it in on your ear without the music you can tell the difference because it shut off the outside noice, giving you complete privacy and when you turn on the music your like in heaven, i suggest this to everyone out there who like to listen to music. put this on in a crowded area and your on your own. i give it 10 stars.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: A bit pricey but you get what you pay for.
Item.Review:
I use them on a daily bases and they never get uncomfortable.
Only con is that they need 2 AAA batteries. I have had them since Thanksgiving and I have had to replace them once already.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: pretty much EVERYTHING
Cons: leaks a lot of noise
These headphones are definately the best headphones out there. sure there are 50 cent headphones, and believe me, my brother has them and these sound much much better. there is just one down side. i like to have my headphones playing a pretty high volume, i just cant listen to my music softly because too much noise comes through from your surrondings. but they leak a lot of noise out of the headphones when you have them on. but other than that everything was fantastic, and i would even go as far to say its WORTH the money and NOT OVER PRICED! *gasp!* yes i said it

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Cons: battery...
The battery is too short, even though i haven't used the beats in 2weeks, the battery is out... should there also be something under the "R"? some letters or symbols?

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: noise cancellation, sound quality
Cons: breaks often, speakers blow out
Bought these for the BF, he loves them!!! He says they are the BEST for listening to his music, not to mention he is able to tune me out (says the outside noise cancellation is good).
I gave an Average for price and Average for durability rating only because when I went to purchase this item the cashier highly recommended I add the $30 insurance as "they break often." As I purchase a pair of headphones OVER $100 I'd rather not hear they break often, she mentioned that many people bring them back in for new ones since they often blow out. I purchased them anyways since the BF wanted them, but if they were for me I would have put them back on the shelf.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality and looks.
Cons: After a while of use- tends to loosen up / Price
I work as a music producer and i been wanting a good pair of headphones and a while back i decided to buy the Studios, and wow what a great thing i did buying these. After Falling INLOVE with these headphones i went back to buy the white ones to have an extra pair in the Singing booth, after that i went back to Best Buy and bought the new color- RED ;) I Highly recommend these headphones to ALL music Lovers

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review: These headphones are the best headphones that I have ever used sound quality is great build quality is ok but I got that 2 year geek squad thing. The only bad thing is that they leak a lot other then that the color is great. I was thinking about getting the solo hd's but these are much better.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: almost everything
Cons: Monster cable
This is my fifth pair of beats and my first studios. I tell you one thing these headphones are worth it. The sound quality is great, comfort excellent and durability is spectacular. The only thing I don't like is when you get the monster cable with the controltalk it can't change volume. Besides that great headphones.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: The Style, Sound, Quality In Structure.
Cons: Nothing
I love Beats By Dr. Dre and now that they came out with the red. I think that is even more fantastic. The thing that people say that's bad about them is the built quality (flimsy structure). I think the red ones are more built than the black and white version because this is a newer version of the beats and because Jimmy and Dr. Dre himself said " We we'll not stop until it's right and the sound is right,too." On one of my selections on club beats videos. I think if you want some styling headphones and some good sound quality and built quality. GET THESE!
P.S. If the review did not help you because you think there still flimsy structure give me a comment back,please try to make it appropriate and nice if your ... furious or aggravated?
Thank You expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: these headphones are one of a kind
Item.Review:
Pros: good box and carrying case; good looking; very good sound and bass; control talk awesome!; light weight; very durable
Cons: too expensive
i love these headphones, first off they are soo cool looking, and they are worth what you are paying for. even though they are so expensive, it delivers the best sound quality and the lean look with a comfort setting on the ear. i recommend these headphones.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: Beats knocking like cops on your door
Item.Review:
Pros: good box and carrying case; good looking; very good sound and bass
Cons: too expensive
If you're all about aesthetics and can afford this piece of auditory gold, then go for it. Featured in count less music videos and such, worn by all your favorite musicians, these headphones are not only famous and look great but they actually live up to their worth. You hear nothing but your music, getting lost in your own musical paradise wherever you may be. The case is nice but I doubt many use it, I certainly don't because they are everywhere with me and don't use them that heavily to get them damaged in any way as far as I'm concerned. I've gotten a lot of compliments and good looks from both males and females if that is any indicator of their awesome ability to attract attentio ... n, if that is what you seek. Deep bass, and smooth and crisp all around. Sounds like you're right there in the studio while they are making the music and it feels so amazing. A cheaper alternative is the Beats Solo. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: anyone who can afford these needs them
Item.Review:
Pros: sound comfort battery life
Cons: cost but worth every penny I did 6 month no interest
I tried 6 different sets cause I didn't want to spend this kind of money on headphones nothing compared klipch bose sony nothing I tried the beats in ear set for 99 amazing bit I get ear infections alot and can't have them in my ear otherwise they would have been it for me I tried the beats over ear solos and I didn't like the constant pressure they put on my ears the studio its perfect for me if you can afford them get them if not and you can handle plugs in your ears get the plain old beats you will not be disappointed by any of them

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: SOUND QUALITY, STYLE, COMFORT
Cons: PRICE, RUNS ON BATTERIES
THESE HEADPHONES ARE LEGIT I WAS SKEPTICAL ABOUT BUYING A 300 DOLLAR PAIR OF HEADPHONES BUT DECIDED TO GIVE DEM A TRY. YOU REALLY CAN HEAR THINGS IN SONGS THAT YOU CANT HERE EVEN WITH THE BEST STEREO SYSTEMS. THE ONLY DOWNSIDE IS THAT THEY RUN ON 2 AAA BATTERIES WHICH ARE INCLUDED WITH THE PURCHASE. BUT THAT DOWNSIDE IS JUST A MINOR SET BACK GET UR SELF SOME RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES AND YOUR GOOD.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: sound quality
I am a DR DRE fan and knowing that he put out this product, was a great opportunity to buy them and listen to his music using this awesome headphones. Good Buy

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.ReviewTitle: normal headphones for a crazy price
Item.Review:
Pros: it makes you look cool
Cons: everything else
please do not waste your hard earned money especially in this economy on these horrible headphones there is bass only when you turn them all the way up and the sound is the same as any other headphones if u want some good sound i would recommend some Sennheiser if you want style and to look cool buy these because that's what they are good for

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:
Pros: Style and Comfort
Cons: sound quality, value for price and noise cancellation
These headphones r great if u got money to burn and only care about style and ok sound quality. the noise cancellation is terrible u can here everything around u. dont buy them they r not worth it.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review: The style and comfort are a 10/10, however the sound quality is about that you would get from a 150$ pair of panasonic jams, if u dont mind the bit extra cash these look and feel 10x better, however

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review: i love these headphones, i got the red ones and i havent seen too many of them, quality is very good when i put them on i really cant hear anything only kind of bad thing is that you need batteries to use these headphone so i say get rechargeable AAA batteries

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review: I been eyeing the red studios for a while and picked up my order to store pair today. The red is a nice deep candy red, perfect to set these apart. Highly recommend the color.

Item.Item: Monster Beats by Dr. Dre Studio High-Definition Headphones - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Red
Item.Review:

I wear these around at the gym and all my friends envy me. DEFINITELY worth the buy.
